title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Featuring 18.26 Carats of Natural Emeralds and 3.11 Carats of brilliant-cut Diamonds. Diamonds display exceptional brilliance
features: This exquisite necklace features a floral motif with delicately arranged diamonds surrounding vibrant emerald teardrop stones. The design blends traditional South Indian floral aesthetics with a modern diamond setting, creating a piece that is both classic and contemporary. Notice the intricate diamond clusters that form flower-like patterns, enhancing the overall brilliance and sophisticated look. Delicate diamond fringes highlight the central teardrop gemstone.
colors: Primarily white and green. The white gold provides a cool
modern backdrop for the brilliant diamonds and the rich green hues of the emeralds.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
or any event where you desire to make a grand statement. A contemporary design that is suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: This Haaram is a striking blend of traditional South Indian design and modern craftsmanship. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds guarantee an eye-catching sparkle and a luxurious feel. Its unique floral pattern symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it a memorable addition to any fine jewelry collection. The comfortable design ensures a secure and elegant fit.
